catentdesc.name: Albini Tots Girls' Jeans with Ruffled Cuffs
catentdesc.shortdescription: Girls ' boot-cut jeans with ruffled cuffs
catentdesc.longdescription: Durable jeans with a feminine flair! These comfortable Albini boot cut jeans will look so cute on her, with their ruffled cuffs and stylish pockets.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Girls' Straight Leg Jeans
catentdesc.shortdescription: Girls ' premium denim straight leg jean
catentdesc.longdescription: A classic pair of straight leg blue denim jeans for a young girl on the move. She can play tag, kick a soccer ball, or do a cartwheel in these jeans, made of cotton denim with a hint of spandex to make it easier to move about. Perfect for a young girl who likes to be active.

catentdesc.name: Albini Tots Girls' Straight Leg Jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: How can a pair of jeans be so cute and so comfortable? These blue cotton denim jeans from Albini Tots have a relaxed, straight leg, fit for every day wear. She will love them!

catentdesc.name: Gusso Kidswear
catentdesc.longdescription: Classic boot-cut denim jeans with five pockets, an elastic waistline, and a slight blee bottom shape. Made of prewashed cotton denim, these jeans have that comfortable feel that will make her want to wear them every day. At such low price, you might want to buy more than one pair!

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Girls' Low Rise Skinny Jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: With their low rise waist and skinny legs, these jeans exude style. Made of cotton denim with a touch of spandex, so these jeans have a bit of stretch to them. From Hermitage.

catentdesc.name: Albini Tots Girls' Hearts&Flowers Jeans
catentdesc.shortdescription: Girls ' boot-cut jeans with a pretty hearts & flowers graphic
catentdesc.longdescription: Functional and pretty! She will be adorable in these gorgeous Albini jeans patterned with colorful hearts and flowers! With an elastic waist, these prewashed blue denim jeans feel soft and comfortable.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Girls' Jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: Perfect for the playground, these classic denim jeans from Hermitage feel comfortable and look stylish, too. These jeans sit just below the waist, for a comfortable fit.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Kidswear Girls' Sweat Pants
catentdesc.shortdescription: Girls ' sweat pants with elasticized waist
catentdesc.longdescription: Pocketed sweat pants with an elasticized waist for the girl on the go. She can run, spin, jump and play all day long in these comfortable cotton and polyester pants

catentdesc.name: Versatil Girls' Prewashed Jeans
catentdesc.shortdescription: Girls ' prewashed straight leg denim jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: Stylish and comfortable, these pre-washed denim jeans from Versatil are sure to please. Made of durable cotton denim, these jeans have a straight leg cut.
